SELECT ri.id, ri.post_id AS postId, ri.user_id AS userId, ri.content, ri.create_date AS createDate, ui.avatar, ui.user_name AS userName, pi.title FROM reply_info ri LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON ( ui.id = ri.user_id ) LEFT JOIN post_info pi ON ( pi.id = ri.post_id ) WHERE 1 = 1
AND ui.user_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{replyInfo.userName},'%')
AND pi.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{replyInfo.title},'%')
